P097159.project_name: FINANCE AND GROWTH Development Policy Loan

keywords.cdata: Accounting, Accounting Principles, accounting standards, adverse effects, adverse impact, aggregate demand, arbitrage, assets, AUDITING, audits, balance sheets, bank lending, bank loans, bank run, banking crisis, banking sector, banking system, bankruptcy, benchmark, bonds, Borrowing, capital adequacy, capital markets, Central Bank, commercial banks, competitiveness, consolidation, contingent liabilities, Contract enforcement, corporate governance, credit risk, Credit Unions, debt, debt service, debt structure, deposit insurance, deposits, development banks, DEVELOPMENT POLICY, disintermediation, domestic credit, economic expansion, economic growth, economic policies, economic recovery, emerging economies, Emerging Markets, employment, equity markets, exports, external auditors, Factoring, financial crises, financial crisis, Financial Institutions, financial intermediaries, Financial Management, financial markets, financial performance, financial reforms, Financial Reporting, Financial Reporting Standards, financial sector, financial sector development, financial sector reform, financial services, financing mechanisms, fiscal discipline, fixed rate bonds, foreign banks, foreign entry, foreign exchange, Free Trade, GAAP, GDP, Generally Accepted Accounting Principles, government debt, government securities, Gross Domestic Product, growth potential, growth rate, Housing, housing finance, Inflation, insolvency, Insurance, interest rates, international bond markets, international

project_abstract.cdata: The development objectives of Development Policy Loan for Mexico will support sustainable growth and the alleviation of poverty by: (a) contributing to reduce the probability of a systemic financial crisis; (b) fostering the sustainable growth of a financial system and capital markets that address the needs of the productive sector and increase overall competitiveness of the economy; and (c) diversifying the range of savings and investment instruments available to households. The second Development Policy Loan will support the completion of implementation of the reform agenda in the financial sector in these three areas. This operation will be prepared provided that the reforms supported by the first loan are sustained and that macroeconomic stability in Mexico continues to prevail.

P097159.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ES</LangCode><ProjectName>Préstamo para políticas de desarrollo sobre FINANZAS Y CRECIMIENTO</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>Los objetivos de desarrollo del Préstamo para el desarrollo de políticas para México apoyarán el crecimiento sostenible y el alivio de la pobreza mediante las acciones siguientes: a) reducir la probabilidad de sufrir una crisis financiera sistémica; b) fomentar el crecimiento sostenible de un sistema financiero y de mercados de capital que respondan a las necesidades del sector productivo y aumenten la competitividad general de la economía, y c) diversificar los instrumentos de ahorro e inversión disponibles para los hogares. El segundo Préstamo para el desarrollo de políticas apoyará la finalización de la puesta en práctica del programa de reforma del sector financiero en estas tres áreas. Esta operación se preparará siempre que las reformas apoyadas por el primer préstamo se mantengan y que prevalezca la estabilidad macroeconómica de México.</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
